title: Rental Bathroom Amenity Projects - Sojo and Clean the World Revolutionize Rental Amenities Recycling (TrendHunter.com)
text:
Sojo, the first automated amenity platform for the vacation rental industry, proudly announces its partnership with Clean the World, a sustainability pioneer in water, sanitation, and hygiene. This collaboration marks a significant step towards reducing landfill waste by recycling vacation rental bathroom amenities.
Together, Sojo and Clean the World are set to transform the vacation rental sector by offering a seamless recycling solution for used soap bars and plastic bottle amenities. Through Clean the World's facilities, soap is repurposed into new bars, and plastics are recycled into flakes for new products, while the residue is utilized in cleaning agents.
This initiative significantly contributes to global sustainability efforts, with over 75 million bars of soap distributed to those in need and 24 million pounds of waste diverted from landfills to date. Sojo's innovative approach ensures property managers effortlessly supply eco-friendly amenities, customized for a unique guest experience, directly in line with turnover schedules. This partnership not only eases operational burdens but also champions environmental responsibility in the hospitality industry.
Sojo and Clean the World Revolutionize Rental Amenities Recycling
